description:
Do you want to take the CFA Program but are worried about your lack of accounting experience? 

Fitch Learning's Financial Reporting and Analysis foundation course, taught by expert CFA tutors, will help you feel more confident.

Recorded in a real Fitch Learning classroom, this dynamic video series is essential for CFA candidates who wish to brush up on accounting before studying Level I. 

Experience the Fitch Learning classroom, wherever you are in the world.
title: CFA Level I Foundation: Introduction to Financial Reporting
